Package life.expert.riso.domain.repository

Interface ReactiveRepository<T,​ID>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of elements inside repository
    ID - the type of ID of element in repository (reserved on the future)
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CanvasRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryCanvasRepository
    public interface ReactiveRepository<T,​ID>
    Enterprise pattern: repository with reactive customization Based on Spring's ReactiveCRUDRepository interface

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Long> count()
      Returns the number of entities available.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Void> deleteAll()
      Deletes all entities managed by the repository.
      reactor.core.publisher.Flux<T> findAll()
      Returns all instances of the type.
      <S extends T>
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<S>      		 save​(S entity)
      Saves a given entity.
      <S extends T>
      reactor.core.publisher.Flux<S>      		 saveAll​(java.lang.Iterable<S> entities)
      Saves all given entities.
      <S extends T>
      reactor.core.publisher.Flux<S>      		 saveAll​(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<S> entityStream)
      Saves all given entities.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        <S extends T> reactor.core.publisher.Mono<S> save​(S entity)
        Saves a given entity. Use the returned instance for further operations as the save operation might have changed the entity instance completely.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the type parameter
        Parameters:
        entity - must not be null.
        Returns:
        Mono emitting the saved entity. The method returns the successful or unsuccessful saving of the object in the form of the corresponding events of Mono.

      • saveAll

        <S extends T> reactor.core.publisher.Flux<S> saveAll​(java.lang.Iterable<S> entities)
        Saves all given entities.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the type parameter
        Parameters:
        entities - must not be null.
        Returns:
        Flux emitting the saved entities. The method returns the successful or unsuccessful saving of the objects in the form of the corresponding events of Mono.

      • saveAll

        <S extends T> reactor.core.publisher.Flux<S> saveAll​(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<S> entityStream)
        Saves all given entities.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the type parameter
        Parameters:
        entityStream - must not be null.
        Returns:
        Flux emitting the saved entities.

      • findAll

        reactor.core.publisher.Flux<T> findAll()
        Returns all instances of the type.
        Returns:
        Flux emitting all entities. returns onlyu complete event - if no instances in repository

      • count

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Long> count()
        Returns the number of entities available.
        Returns:
        Mono emitting the number of entities.

      • deleteAll

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Void> deleteAll()
        Deletes all entities managed by the repository.
        Returns:
        Mono signaling when operation has completed.
